messages.subject: Sullivan readers
messages.messageBody:
<<And of course I am interested in hearing other suggestions for materials
that might qualify as "curriculum" but are still creative and/or interesting
for kids.>>

Usborne books. They are wonderful nonfiction books...on practically every subject. My little brother who hates reading loves these books. My children and I also love these books. Yes, I sell them...but just mostly to myself and my family. LOL They do have an online catalog... http://www.ubah.com/cat_ubah/cat-search.asp. If you want suggestions about books for different subjects and age groups or if you'd like to see some of the books in person, I could help you find a consultant in your area...I'd be happy to help. They do sell some of the books at book stores too. But they usually have a very limited selection.

~Heather
